root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 3-1-1, translated into en
root.data: The input datasets are updated prior to each new publication round of the maternal mortality ratio (MMR) estimates. Source data are collected by countries, typically annually for civil registration and vital statistics (CRVS) sources, every 3-5 years for specialized reviews, every 5-7 years for population-based surveys, and every 10 years for censuses.
